GamepadPoseAngularAcceleration.summary: The angularAcceleration read-only property of the interface returns an array representing the angular acceleration vector of the , in meters per second per second.

remarks.para: In other words, the current acceleration of the sensor's rotation around the x, y, and z axes.

GamepadPoseAngularAcceleration.value: A , or null if the gamepad is not able to provide angular acceleration information.
